page.title: 06Lodmoor Country Park.
page.content: I like going to{Lodmoor Country Park} .It used to be a tip,but now it has all sorts of activities. Some parts are just little walks where rabbits and hares live.Nearby are picnic and barbeque areas. You can play on a giant bumpy slide,go-karts and the water scouts. Newer attractions include the{ {Miniature Train,Sealife {Centre,Butterfly Farm and Model {Village.}The Sealife Centre has giant tanks,where you can see lots of fish,many caught by local fishermen.The Butterfly Farm has a jungle-like atmosphere in which giant butterflies fly freely.At the Model Village you can see hundreds of hand made models set out in a lovely garden. Peter Richmond
